avdta.vehicle.fuel

Class VehicleClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.vehicle.fuel.VehicleClass
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BEV, ICV

    public abstract class VehicleClass
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for calculating the energy consumption as vehicles travel through the network. Subclasses should override calcPower(double, double, double). There is no need to instantiate a new VehicleClass for each Vehicle.

      • getVehClass

        public static VehicleClass getVehClass(int type)
        Returns the VehicleClass subclass for the given type parameter
        Parameters:
        type - the vehicle type
        Returns:
        the corresponding VehicleClass

      • calcEnergy

        public double calcEnergy(double time,
                         double speed,
                         double accel,
                         double grade)
        Calculates the energy consumption for the given duration with the given speed, acceleration, and road grade. This appeals to calcPower(double, double, double).
        Parameters:
        time - the duration (s)
        speed - speed (mi/hr)
        accel - acceleration (mi/hr/s)
        grade - road grade (radians)
        Returns:
        energy consumption

      • calcPower

        public abstract double calcPower(double speed,
                                 double accel,
                                 double grade)
        Returns the power required for the given speed, acceleration, and grade
        Parameters:
        speed - speed (mi/hr)
        accel - acceleration (mi/hr/s)
        grade - road grade (radians)
        Returns:
        power required

      • getType

        public abstract int getType()
        Returns a type code for this VehicleClass
        Returns:
        depends on subclass
